description: The VP didn't wear a mask during his visit to the Mayo Clinic, saying he wanted to "look them in the eye and say thank you."
title: Don Lemon Dons Mask To Mock Mike Pence's 'Ridiculous' Excuse For Not Wearing One
title_page: Don Lemon Dons Mask To Mock Mike Pence's 'Ridiculous' Excuse For Not Wearing One | HuffPost
maintext:
